Age 35 & older:	APPLICANT MUST BE 35 OR OLDER WHEN POLICY STARTS. MOTOR VEHICLE RECORD CANNOT EXCEED 1 ACCIDENT AND /OR 3 TICKETS IN THE LAST THREE YEARS										
Displacement	P1	P2	P3	Limits of Liability				Limits of Liability			
(CC's)	2015 & 2014	2013 & 2012	2011 & older 	25/50/25	50/100/25	100/300/50	250/500/100	25/50/25	50/100/25	100/300/50	250/500/100
1-370	211	122	92	132	192	230	257	154	214	252	279
371-575	239	137	105	176	254	302	337	204	282	330	365
576-750	348	197	153	210	303	361	403	243	336	394	436
571-950	396	223	174	267	389	465	517	312	434	510	562
951-1210	619	347	273	323	471	562	627	377	525	616	681
1211-1400	683	382	300	373	540	645	718	433	600	705	778
1401 & Over	725	406	319	378	546	652	725	438	606	712	785
Mopeds	N/A			N/A				32	38	45	49

Age 20 & under:	MOTOR VEHICLE RECORD CANNOT EXCEED 1 ACCIDENT AND /OR 2 TICKETS IN THE LAST THREE YEARS. APPLICANTS 20 AND YOUNGER WISHING TO INSURE A MOTORCYCLE 501CC OR LARGER ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE AN  INDIANA MOTORCYCLE DRIVER'S LICENSE. A MOTORCYCLE PERMIT  FOR MOTORCYCLES 500CC OR SMALLER										
Displacement	P1	P2	P3	Limits of Liability				Limits of Liability			
(CC's)	2015 & 2014	2013 & 2012	2011 & older 	25/50/25	50/100/25	100/300/50	250/500/100	25/50/25	50/100/25	100/300/50	250/500/100
